contentrichtext.text: {{TOC right}} {{wiktionary|uga}} '''UGA''' or '''Uga''' may refer to: ==Higher Education== * [[University of Georgia]], an American land-grant, sea-grant research university located in Athens, Georgia, USA ** [[Uga (mascot)]], the English bulldog representing the University of Georgia Bulldogs team since 1956 ==Organizations== * [[United Game Artists]], a second-party developer of computer and video games for SEGA * [[United Golf Association]] was a group of African-American professional golfers who operated a separate series of professional golf tournaments for Blacks during the era of racial segregation ==Science and Technology== * UGA, a [[stop codon]] within genetic code * [[Universal geometric algebra]] * User Global Area, part of the [[System Global Area]] in Oracle database software * [[UXGA]] or UGA, Ultra Graphics Array ==Locations== * [[Uga, Nigeria]], a town in Anambra, Nigeria * [[Uqah]] or Uga, a village in Azerbaijan ==See also== * [[Ugas]], characters in the Conker series * [[Ooga]], a game developed by Bolt Creative * [[Elisa Uga]], an Italian fencer * [[Air Uganda]]'s ICAO airline designation {{disambiguation}}
